div.div: Climate-induced erosion feedback on net soil C flux (Mg C km −2 year −1).
div.p: The values represent the difference in net soil C flux (ΔC netAE) between the accelerated erosion (AE) and current erosion (CE) scenarios ( Eq. 2) over the period 2016–2100. ( A and B) The e and r model configurations. Negative values indicate an erosion-induced source of C to the atmosphere driven by a variation in rainfall erosivity, while positive values show an erosion-induced C sink.
